main event: An unidentified object was observed in Brunswick, Georgia on 06/23/1954, resembling a white and brilliant basketball, maintaining level flight for 10-15 seconds before disappearing, with the conclusion stating it could have been a meteor.
interesting points: The observation lasted for an unusual 10 seconds, which is atypical for meteor sightings.
No physical evidence or photographs were provided to support the observation.
The report suggests that the object could have been an astronomical phenomenon, specifically a meteor.
The shape of the object was described as resembling a basketball, indicating a spherical appearance.
The report was part of Project Blue Book, a U.S. Air Force study that investigated UFO sightings.
